Article Title: Smriti Mandhana breaks silence after wedding cancelled: 'I don‚Äôt think I love anything more than cricket'
Article Text:
Smriti Mandhana (X)

NEW DELHI: India's batting sensation and ODI World Cup-winning vice-captain Smriti Mandhana said that one truth has become clearer to her than anything else over the past 12 years as a professional cricketer ‚Äî there is nothing she cares about more deeply than the game of cricket.India‚Äôs most accomplished left-handed batter in women's cricket looked back on her journey, from her international debut in 2013 to helping India lift the ICC ODI World Cup last month for the first time in their history, while speaking at the Amazon Smbhav Summit on Wednesday. Mandhana spoke openly about what fuels her commitment each day as an India cricketer. ‚ÄúI don‚Äôt think there is anything I love more than cricket. Putting on the India jersey is the biggest motivation. No matter what you‚Äôre going through, that one thought helps you block everything out,‚Äù she said.Even as a child, she knew exactly what she wanted after growing up. ‚ÄúThe obsession with batting was always there. People around me didn‚Äôt really get it, but in my head I wanted only one thing ‚Äî to be known as a world champion.‚ÄùShe described the ODI World Cup win as the result of years of hard work and disappointment.‚ÄúThis trophy was the outcome of everything we‚Äôve been fighting for.I‚Äôve played for more than a decade, and so many times things didn‚Äôt fall into place. Before the final, we pictured that moment over and over again. When it finally appeared on the screen, it genuinely gave us goosebumps. It was emotional in every way.‚ÄùThe occasion was even more overwhelming with legends Mithali Raj and Jhulan Goswami watching from the stands. ‚ÄúWe desperately wanted to win it for them too. Seeing tears in their eyes felt like the whole of women‚Äôs cricket had achieved something. It was a victory for everyone who came before us.‚ÄùMandhana shared the biggest lessons she carried from the triumph: ‚ÄúYou always start from zero, regardless of what you scored previously. And never play for yourself ‚Äî that‚Äôs something we kept telling one another.‚ÄùThis event also marked Mandhana‚Äôs first public appearance since she confirmed the cancellation of her wedding with musician Palash Muchhal .
Article Summary: Smriti mandhana spoke at the amazon smbhav summit on wednesday. India's odi world cup-winning vice-captain said there is nothing she loves more than cricket. The left-handed batsman made her international debut in 2013. She described the win as the result of years of hard work and disappointment.

Article Title: MLB trade rumors: Baltimore Orioles could land $400 million Chicago Cubs superstar after blockbuster $155 million Pete Alonso deal
Article Text:
Baltimore Orioles starting pitcher Grayson Rodriguez (Image via AP Photo/Stephanie Scarbrough, File)

How the Pete Alonso and Kyle Tucker Moves Would Work

FILE - New York Mets' Pete Alonso reacts during a baseball game against the Milwaukee Brewers, Saturday, Aug. 9, 2025, in Milwaukee. (AP Photo/Aaron Gash, File)

Why Pete Alonso and Kyle Tucker Fit the Baltimore Orioles‚Äô Competitive Window

What Each Side Gains

Baltimore Orioles

Pete Alonso

New York Mets' Pete Alonso runs the bases after hitting a solo home run during the first inning of a baseball game against the Detroit Tigers, Tuesday, Sept. 2, 2025, in Detroit. (Image via AP Photo/Ryan Sun, File)

Kyle Tucker and Astros Fallout

While the upside is enormous, the moves come with real risks:

Why These Moves Could Redefine the AL East Race

The Baltimore Orioles are suddenly operating like a win-now powerhouse, with two major offseason swings dominating league chatter. First, the club has reportedly finalized a five-year, $155 million contract with Pete Alonso. Now, executives around the league believe Baltimore is preparing a second strike: an all-out pursuit of free-agent star Kyle Tucker. If both moves land, oddsmakers project the Orioles‚Äô World Series odds to jump from +3500 into the league‚Äôs top tier, potentially cracking the top-10 contender range.This one-two punch would dramatically alter the AL East landscape, transforming a young, pitching-thin roster into a heavyweight built around elite power, contact, and postseason-tested production.Pete Alonso‚Äôs arrival locks down first base immediately. Ryan Mountcastle becomes the roster piece pushed aside, with Alonso‚Äôs 30-plus homer floor and righty-friendly power profile fitting perfectly in Camden Yards. His shift away from Citi Field‚Äôs pitcher-leaning layout is expected to boost both slugging and consistency, offering the Orioles a dependable middle-order anchor for five seasons.Kyle Tucker requires no trade capital, only financial firepower.The All-Star outfielder is projected to command an eight-to-ten-year contract worth roughly $400 million after his tenure with Houston. A signing of that scale would give the Baltimore Orioles one of the most complete hitters in baseball, and a proven base-stealer capable of 20 bags per season.After securing Tucker, Baltimore could flip from surplus to strategic sellers. Outfielders like Heston Kjerstad or Colton Cowser become valuable trade chips for rotation upgrades, especially important for a team light on frontline pitching. The club‚Äôs recent acquisition of Taylor Ward only heightens this pressure, creating an outfield logjam that almost guarantees movement.Both players sit in the 28-31 age range, right in the center of their prime production years. Pete Alonso brings All-Star muscle and a top-tier hard-hit profile. Kyle Tucker brings elite on-base skill, gap power, and defensive value, with multiple All-Star nods backing up his consistency.Their skillsets complement each other cleanly, one delivers explosive right-handed slugging, the other stabilizes the offense with left-handed balance and speed. For an Orioles lineup that struggled generating righty home-run production in 2025, this mix solves a central issue.These figures show why the Orioles see synergy in this pairing. Alonso‚Äôs top-end batted-ball data boosts run production, while Tucker‚Äôs WAR reflects value across contact, discipline, and fielding.‚Ä¢ 60‚Äì70 combined home runs added to a lineup needing thump‚Ä¢ A legitimate jump in championship potential from +3500 odds‚Ä¢ Long-term lineup stability extending through 2033 and beyond‚Ä¢ Flexibility to move surplus outfield talent for pitching help‚Ä¢ A hitter-friendly ballpark compared to Citi Field‚Ä¢ A multi-year payday after betting on himself in 2025‚Ä¢ A chance to anchor a rising contender in the AL East‚Ä¢ Tucker secures a franchise-changing mega contract‚Ä¢ Houston clears significant payroll amid its shifting roster timelinePotential Downsides for Baltimore‚Ä¢ Combined deals could push payroll past $60 million per year for two players‚Ä¢ Luxury tax pressure forces the Orioles toward budget pitching signings‚Ä¢ Trading Ward, Cowser, or Kjerstad weakens long-term outfield depth‚Ä¢ Tucker‚Äôs hand injury history and Alonso‚Äôs rising strikeout rate (20 percent-plus in 2025) pose durability questionsIf Baltimore pulls off both acquisitions, the Orioles leap from promising to dangerous. The team gains two middle-order stars who have thrived in high-leverage stretches, instantly rivaling the Yankees and Guardians for division control. Betting markets have already reacted: Alonso‚Äôs signing alone nudged the Orioles upward, while projections indicate a Tucker addition would elevate them into the tier with the Dodgers and Phillies.With the Mets sliding after losing Alonso and the Astros navigating a possible roster reset, Baltimore‚Äôs aggression would dominate the offseason conversation.The Orioles rarely swing big. This offseason, they look ready to swing twice. Signing Pete Alonso gives them home-run security and presence. Chasing Kyle Tucker gives them a modern offensive superstar. Together, these moves position Baltimore not just as a threat, but as a frontrunner in the American League, reshaping expectations for 2026 and beyond.Also read: MLB trade rumors: New York Mets predicted to land $400 million Chicago Cubs superstar outfielder to bolster rotation amid treacherous offseasonz If ownership commits the financial muscle required, Birdland may be on the brink of its boldest era yet.
Article Summary: The baltimore orioles are reportedly close to signing pete alonso and kyle tucker. If both moves land, oddsmakers project the orioles‚Äô world series odds to jump from +3500 into the league‚Äôs top tier. Kyle tucker is projected to command an eight-to-ten-year contract worth roughly $400 million after his tenure with houston.

Article Title: Tom Brady reacts strongly to Michigan football turmoil as Sherrone Moore‚Äôs arrest leaves the Wolverines stunned
Article Text:
Tom Brady addresses Michigan football crisis with candid thoughts after Sherrone Moore‚Äôs arrest shakes the program (Getty Images)

Tom Brady doesn't want Michigan stars leaving amid Sherrone Moore fallout



Tom Brady‚Äôs voice carries weight in any football conversation, but it hits differently when the University of Michigan is involved. As the school faces a storm of uncertainty after the arrest of former head coach Sherrone Moore, the program‚Äôs identity has been shaken. In the middle of this tension, Brady stepped forward, not as an NFL legend, but as an alumnus trying to steady a team at risk of falling apart. His words arrived at a moment when rival programs were circling, eager to lure away the Wolverines‚Äô top talent.What could have been a quiet recruitment battle quickly turned into a public tug-of-war. With fans confused, players uneasy and critics loud, Brady pushed for unity. His stance was not about looking back at Michigan‚Äôs past, but about protecting the athletes who must carry the school forward during its most fragile moment.The arrest of Sherrone Moore created a wave of reactions inside and outside Ann Arbor. Reports about an alleged ‚Äúinappropriate relationship‚Äù placed the entire program under a harsh spotlight as the City of Saline Police Department confirmed it had detained Moore after investigators found ‚Äúcredible‚Äù evidence. Pittsfield Township Police later added that an ‚Äúalleged assault‚Äù had been reported and that the suspect was held at Washtenaw County Jail pending charges.The investigation remains open, and the distractions continue.Amid this turmoil, the spotlight shifted to Michigan‚Äôs prized quarterbacks, especially Bryce Underwood. Rivals did not waste a second. Former LSU star Tyrann Mathieu jumped in publicly, urging Underwood to consider a fresh start in Louisiana. On X, he wrote: ‚ÄúCome home son @BryceUnderwoo16. We are waiting & will accept you with open arms. FOREVER LSU.‚ÄùBrady was watching, and he refused to let the pitch go unchallenged. Commenting under Sports Illustrated‚Äôs post about Mathieu‚Äôs message, Brady fired back with clarity and purpose. ‚ÄúHe's a wolverine !!! And gonna get back to work and lead us next year!!! LFG.‚ÄùFans reacted in every direction, with some calling for Brady to coach the team himself, while others mocked the timing. But beneath the noise, his point was simple. Michigan cannot afford to lose its foundation while navigating a crisis. Stability matters. Loyalty matters. And to Brady, the Wolverines‚Äô future leaders should stay right where they are.If Michigan is going to rebuild its footing, it will need players who choose commitment over chaos. Brady made sure Underwood, and everyone watching, heard that message loud and clear.Also Read: Fired Michigan coach Sherrone Moore reportedly felt ‚Äúsuicidal‚Äù after police responded to tense visit at assistant‚Äôs apartment
Article Summary: Tom brady addresses michigan football crisis with candid thoughts after sherrone moore‚Äôs arrest shakes the program. Brady stepped forward, not as an nfl legend, but as an alumnus trying to steady a team at risk of falling apart. His words arrived at a moment when rival programs were circling, eager to lure away the wolverines' top talent.

Article Title: Cincinnati Bengals QB Joe Burrow hints at early retirement with a cryptic statement during a press conference
Article Text:
(Image via Getty: Joe Burrow)

Joe Burrow sparks speculation about an early NFL departure after dropping a mysterious hint at his latest press meeting

Joe Burrow Press Conference - December 10

Joe Burrow press conference - December 10

Reporter:

Burrow:

Reporter:

Burrow:

Reporter:

Burrow:

Reporter:

Burrow:

Also Read:

When someone truly relishes their sport on every level, staying in the game for the long haul feels natural. But for those who lose that ‚Äúfun‚Äù aspect, stepping away becomes a way to protect their well-being. This crossroads may be where Cincinnati Bengals star quarterback Joe Burrow now stands. At a recent press conference, the 29-year-old signal caller revealed that while his toe injury did not dull his competitive drive, it did prompt a deep shift in his outlook.For Burrow, joy is essential to endure the mental and physical grind. To keep thriving in his demanding career, he must find genuine enjoyment in the journey. Without that sense of fun, he wonders what the point is. His enigmatic words, which rippled with hints of early retirement, were: ‚ÄúIf I wanna keep doing this, I have to have fun doing it‚Ä¶ I‚Äôve been through a lot‚Ä¶ If it‚Äôs not fun, then what am I doing it for?‚ÄùBurrow stunned fans by returning from a Grade 3 toe turf injury two months ahead of the recovery timeline, defying the odds and expectations. He stormed back onto the gridiron on Thanksgiving Day, leading his team to an effortless 32-14 victory over the Baltimore Ravens, fueled by sheer determination. Yet, the celebration was short-lived as the Buffalo Bills edged them out in a suspenseful thriller, 39-34. Now, with playoff hopes on thin ice and only a 1-3% chance of advancing, the future looks grim for the Bengals.The devastating Week 14 defeat to the Bills dropped their regular season record to 4-9, leaving them third in the AFC North and 12th in the conference.With so many setbacks, it‚Äôs easy to imagine Burrow questioning his path forward, perhaps explaining his mysterious hint at early retirement at his recent press conference.‚ÄúHow did the injury change the way you view the game?‚Äù‚ÄúNo, it certainly doesn‚Äôt change my desire to win. If I wanna keep doing this, I have to have fun doing it‚Ä¶ I‚Äôve been through a lot‚Ä¶ If it‚Äôs not fun, then what am I doing it for? That‚Äôs the mindset I‚Äôm trying to bring to the table.‚Äù‚ÄúIs it difficult to have fun given the season, what you‚Äôve been through physically, emotionally, all of it? Is it tough?‚Äù‚ÄúYeah, certainly.‚Äù‚ÄúHow much of it was fun before? Winning is always fun, but in general, was it fun before you got hurt? Did you view it that way at least?‚Äù‚ÄúNo, I wouldn‚Äôt say I viewed it that way.‚Äù‚ÄúWhat was the changing point?‚Äù‚ÄúI‚Äôm not sure if there‚Äôs a singular moment or a time. It‚Äôs just a reflection on a lot of things that I‚Äôve done and been through in my career. I‚Äôve been through more than most and certainly not easy on the brain or the body, so just trying to have fun doing it.‚Äù
Article Summary: Joe burrow sparks speculation about an early nfl departure after dropping a mysterious hint at his latest press meeting. ‚Äúif i wanna keep doing this, i have to have fun doing it‚Ä¶ i‚Äôve been through a lot‚Ä¶ if it‚Äôs not fun, then what am i doing it for?‚Äù

Article Title: Subriel Matias cleared despite a positive Ostarine test as WBC super lightweight title fight with Dalton Smith stays on
Article Text:
Subriel Matias (via Getty Images)

Subriel Matias proven innocent as the B-sample confirms ostarine levels under permissible limits



Subriel Matias will still defend his WBC super lightweight title against Dalton Smith on January 10, even after testing positive for Ostarine. The fight was first announced earlier this year and was scheduled to take place at the Barclays Center in Brooklyn. But everything changed when Matias returned a positive VADA test on November 9. Notably, Ostarine is a banned substance known for increasing testosterone levels and boosting endurance. It was the same drug found in Ryan Garcia‚Äôs system that earned him a one-year suspension. Yet Matias‚Äô case took a very different turn.Despite the positive result, he was not suspended. Reports now say his B-sample has also come back positive. Still, he is safe to compete. Boxing journalist Dan Rafael reported the update on X and confirmed that the levels found were below the punishment threshold in New York. With the fight staying on the schedule, Matias is now set to move forward with his title defense against the unbeaten star Dalton Smith.Subriel Matias‚Äô drug test case became a major talking point in boxing, especially because most fighters must prove their innocence even when contamination is suspected.Dan Rafael revealed the latest update earlier today. He wrote on X, ‚ÄúPer multiple sources with direct knowledge of the test results, Subriel Matias‚Äô B sample was also positive for Ostarine,‚Äù he posted. ‚ÄúBut was, as expected & how it should be, the same as his A below the 0.1 ng per milliliter threshold for punishment in NY, so [the] Smith fight remains on.‚ÄùEarlier reports noted that Matias would be placed on a one-year probation and must pay for additional testing before fight night. The WBC had already backed him before the B-sample was tested. WBC President Mauricio Sulaiman said they believed the result came from contaminated supplements used during training.‚ÄúHe is not guilty; he has not been found at any level of consuming performance-enhancing drugs,‚Äù Sulaiman had stated.Sulaiman also said their Clean Boxing Program needs updating because many supplements contain banned traces.Meanwhile, the pre-weigh-in numbers for the fight are also confirmed. Matias came in at 153.8 pounds, while Smith weighed 155.6 pounds.Both fighters will now gear up for the ultimate fight. Despite setbacks, the road is now clear for Matias to defend his world title on January 10.Also Read: ‚ÄúYou turned gay" - UFC legend Nate Diaz brutally trolls Ryan Garcia for wanting to train under Khabib Nurmagomedov
Article Summary: Subriel matias tested positive for banned substance ostarine on november 9. Reports now say his b-sample has also come back positive. Matias will still defend his wbc super lightweight title against dalton smith on january 10. The fight was scheduled to take place at the barclays center in brooklyn.

Article Title: NHL Update: Alex Ovechkin goes viral for heartwarming interaction during Washington Capitals community game
Article Text:
Alex Ovechkin of the Washington Capitals warms up before a game against the Columbus Blue Jackets (Credit: Getty Images)

Alex Ovechkin‚Äôs viral 2025 moment delights Capitals and NHL community



Alex Ovechkin may be one of the most prolific goal scorers in NHL history, but once again, he reminded the world that his influence stretches well beyond NHL match-day headlines. During a Washington Capitals community game featuring young participants from local hockey programs, Ovechkin took center stage, not for a highlight-reel goal but for a display of warmth and mentorship.A clip from the event has gone viral across major NHL news platforms. Also, sparking conversations not about his signature one-timer. But about the example he set for young players watching everywhere. For a league where toughness and intensity often dominate discussions. Ovechkin‚Äôs interaction became a refreshing moment. And, that showcased genuine care and leadership.Alex Ovechkin is skating with a group of kids in the viral video. And it is the moment when a young participant loses balance and goes down awkwardly. Without hesitation, the Washington Capitals captain glides over. Then, he checks on the child and helps him back to his feet. His encouragement, combined with playful instruction. And, instantly lifted the mood around the net.What stands out is how Ovechkin managed to balance fun with responsibility. Thus, keeping the game going.While ensuring the young player felt safe and supported, and fans across social media platforms, NHL match preview communities. And even players around the league have reacted with admiration.The Washington Capitals have talked a lot about Ovechkin's leadership off the ice. And this latest event only adds to that story, in a year full of NHL trade rumors, injury updates, and fierce competition. And a small act of kindness has become one of the best NHL news stories of 2025.As the Capitals continue their season, moments like this remind the NHL community that the best ambassadors for the sport aren't just the ones who do well on the ice. They're also the ones who leave a lasting impression on future generations.Also Read: Net worth of former Canucks star Ryan Kesler in 2025: Updated financial insights after recent legal developments
Article Summary: Alex ovechkin‚Äôs viral 2025 moment delights capitals and nhl community. A clip from the event has gone viral across major nhl news platforms. The washington capitals captain helped a young participant get back to his feet. His encouragement, combined with playful instruction, instantly lifted the mood.

Article Title: Rob Gronkowski could unretire if his terms, including limited practice days and a bonus are accepted
Article Text:
Ilya S. Savenok/Getty Images for CBDMEDIC

What Gronkowski actually said about returning to the NFL

‚ÄúI‚Äôd need a solid bonus, and the schedule has to work with my life,‚Äù

Rob Gronkowski, one of the NFL ‚Äôs most electrifying tight ends, just gave fans the ultimate tease. While he‚Äôs been retired for a few years, Gronk floated a playful idea of how to lure him back to the field. At 36, Gronk isn‚Äôt committing to a return but his humor, charm, and legendary status make this ‚Äúwhat if‚Äù scenario irresistible for NFL fans everywhere.During a recent interview, Gronkowski shared the very specific conditions under which he might consider unretiring. He joked that he would only practice Wednesday, Thursday, and Friday, and that a $1 million bonus would be essential to make the deal worthwhile. True to his playful personality, Gronk also estimated the chance of this happening at just 1 percent, signaling that this is more a fun thought experiment than a real plan.Gronk said, keeping fans guessing but entertained. While he‚Äôs clearly not rushing back, the scenario alone sparked excitement across social media.Naturally, the internet went wild. Imagining Gronk in full gear on a practice squad kept fans joking about him only showing up for three days a week, reactions were instant. Some users celebrated the idea of his infectious energy returning to NFL practices, while others pointed out that Gronk‚Äôs legendary partying and personality might clash with a structured team schedule.Even those who doubt a real comeback are enjoying the fantasy of seeing him back in action. After all, few players have been as fun and memorable on and off the field as Gronk.Despite the buzz, a return seems extremely improbable. At 36 years old and after multiple seasons of retirement, Gronk would face physical challenges and lifestyle adjustments. No NFL team has officially expressed interest, and his playful terms, limited practice days and a hefty bonus aren‚Äôt typical for active roster spots.History does show that players sometimes stage surprising comebacks (think Brett Favre or Michael Jordan ), but Gronk‚Äôs scenario remains more of a fan fantasy than a likely reality.Even as a joke, Gronkowski‚Äôs hypothetical return illustrates his lasting influence on both football and pop culture. His larger-than-life personality, marketing appeal, and connection with fans keep him relevant long after his retirement. Whether on the field or in the media, Gronk is a figure who can make headlines with just a tease.Also read - Sherrone Moore‚Äôs firing triggers Shannon Sharpe‚Äôs reflection on his own lawsuit involving an OnlyFans model
Article Summary: Rob gronkowski, one of the nfl‚Äôs most electrifying tight ends, just gave fans the ultimate tease. He joked that he would only practice wednesday, thursday, and friday, and that a $1 million bonus would be essential to make the deal worthwhile. Despite the buzz, a return seems extremely improbable.

Article Title: 42-year-old Aaron Rodgers reacts hilariously to 44-year-old Philip Rivers' NFL comeback: "I‚Äôm not the oldest guy..."
Article Text:
Aaron Rodgers on Philip rivers' NFL return (Imagn Images)

Philip Rivers comeback reaction from Aaron Rodgers



The NFL woke up this week to something few expected to see again. Philip Rivers, freshly 44 and four seasons removed from his last snap, suddenly appeared back in the Indianapolis Colts building. The news moved fast, and it stirred reactions that ranged from shock to pure delight. Among those caught off guard was Mike Tomlin, who kept his focus locked on the Miami Dolphins. He brushed off any deeper discussion with a simple line. ‚ÄúThat‚Äôs none of my business. I‚Äôm trying to be ready for the Dolphins.‚Äù Aaron Rodgers , however, welcomed the topic with a smile. The Steelers quarterback, who celebrated his 42nd birthday earlier this month, treated the moment with humor. ‚ÄúWell, I‚Äôm not the oldest guy in the league. Love that,‚Äù he said, clearly amused by Rivers‚Äô return. It became one of the lighter moments in a tense playoff stretch.Rodgers did not stop at jokes. He laid out what made Rivers‚Äô return so astonishing. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs pretty incredible though. He‚Äôs been out for I believe four full seasons, plus part of this season,‚Äù Rodgers said. He added that his friends immediately asked what he would do in the same situation.His answer was honest and quick. ‚ÄúI said, without missing a beat, ‚ÄòI‚Äôm retired. I‚Äôm staying retired.‚Äô‚ÄùFor Rodgers, the respect runs deep. He praised Rivers in a way that felt personal. ‚ÄúBig credit to Phil. I‚Äôve been a fan of his forever,‚Äù he said. Rodgers admired the way Rivers competed and carried himself, calling him ‚Äúnot the most gifted player‚Äù but ‚Äúcerebral as all get out.‚Äù He also pointed out what fans always loved about Rivers, describing him as a ‚Äúhilarious trash talker,‚Äù and ended by wishing him ‚Äúnothing but the best. ‚ÄùRivers now joins a very small group of active players aged 40 or older, which includes Rodgers, Marcades Lewis, Matt Prater, Nick Folk and Joe Flacco. If Rivers starts this week, he will line up against the Seattle Seahawks, an almost surreal twist after years away from the huddle.Meanwhile, Rodgers continues to show he can guide Pittsburgh through pressure moments. His recent performance in the Steelers‚Äô 27-22 win over the Ravens included his first rushing touchdown in three years. He even brought back the discount double check celebration, a reminder that he can still find joy in the grind.With a one game AFC North lead and Miami up next, Rodgers is focused on the present. Rivers, returning to help the Colts, is stepping right back into a league that never stops moving. Both stories collide in a season where every week seems to create another headline worth watching.Also Read: "Slap in my face": Cam Newton vents frustration as Colts turn to 44-year-old Philip Rivers
Article Summary: Philip rivers returned to the nfl this week, four seasons after his last snap. The news stirred reactions that ranged from shock to pure delight. Steelers quarterback mike tomlin brushed off any deeper discussion with a simple line. Aaron rodgers welcomed the topic with a smile.

Article Title: Kelly Clarkson to kick off NFL Christmas Gameday 2025 on Netflix: When and where to watch, timings and the full holiday lineup
Article Text:
Kelly Clarkson will kick off Netflix's NFL Christmas Gameday with "Underneath the Tree." This marks a significant pop culture and sports crossover, featuring the Dallas Cowboys vs. Washington Commanders and Detroit Lions vs. Minnesota Vikings. Fans can stream the global doubleheader live on Netflix on Christmas Day 2025, promising a festive blend of music and football.

Kelly Clarkson brings holiday star power to Netflix‚Äôs Christmas doubleheader and here‚Äôs how to tune in live



Kelly Clarkson is officially becoming the voice of Christmas football on Netflix. The Emmy- and Grammy-winning superstar will open the global NFL Christmas Gameday broadcast with a festive performance of her beloved holiday hit ‚ÄúUnderneath the Tree,‚Äù marking a dazzling start to one of the most anticipated sports events of the year.For fans who adore both holiday music and high-stakes football, Clarkson‚Äôs appearance is more than a musical moment, it's a crossover between pop culture and sports that only Netflix‚Äôs expanding live programming could deliver. With the Dallas Cowboys, Detroit Lions, Washington Commanders, and Minnesota Vikings headlining the doubleheader, Christmas Day 2025 is shaping up to be a major streaming celebration.A proud Texas native and lifelong Dallas Cowboys supporter, Clarkson is stepping into familiar territory as she welcomes millions to the broadcast. Her performance bridges music and football in a way that mirrors Netflix‚Äôs broader strategy to reshape how fans experience live sports.The matchups: Cowboys vs. Commanders at 1 p.m. ET from Northwest Stadium in Maryland, followed by Lions vs. Vikings at 4:30 p.m. ET from Minneapolis‚Äô U.S.Bank Stadium, will stream globally on Netflix, with all subscribers gaining access regardless of plan type.Fans can tune in simply by logging into their Netflix account on Christmas Day, where the games will appear on the homepage under live programming. With CBS Sports producing the matchups and NFL Media handling studio coverage, viewers can expect high production value and a familiar broadcast feel. This year‚Äôs commentator roster includes favorites like Ian and Noah Eagle, Kay Adams, and Drew Brees, joined by newcomers such as Michael Irvin, Austin Ekeler, and WWE star Seth Rollins.Netflix‚Äôs NFL Christmas tradition continues to grow after record-breaking viewership in 2024, buoyed by Beyonc√©‚Äôs unforgettable halftime performance. While details about this year‚Äôs halftime show remain under wraps, Clarkson‚Äôs opening set guarantees a festive start that blends music, nostalgia, and football fever.Whether you‚Äôre watching the games, the performances, or the holiday excitement, Netflix‚Äôs Christmas Gameday promises to be a centerpiece of the season.
Article Summary: Kelly clarkson will kick off netflix's nfl christmas gameday with "underneath the tree" this marks a significant pop culture and sports crossover, featuring the dallas cowboys vs. washington commanders and detroit lions vs. minnesota vikings. Fans can stream the global doubleheader live on netflix on christmas day 2025, promising a festive blend of music and football.

Article Title: The Game Awards 2025: How to watch live, exclusive announcements, and more
Article Text:
Game Awards 2025. Image via: The Game Awards

How to watch The Game Awards 2025?





üî¥ THE GAME AWARDS 2025: Official 4K60FPS Livestream (Today - 7:30p ET / 4:30p PT / 12:30a GMT)

The Game Awards 2025: Exclusive announcements

The countdown is over and The Game Awards 2025 has taken center stage, pulling the global gaming crowd into one long night of surprises, celebrations, and long-awaited reveals. Excitement has been building for weeks as speculation swirled about which rumors would hold up and which would fall flat. With the show now upon us, players are eager to see the trailers, the premieres, and the big winners that will shape discussions for the months ahead. The mix of awards and high-profile announcements has always made this event a decisive moment that rounds off the year and sets the tone for the industry‚Äôs next steps.This year‚Äôs ceremony arrives with a rare level of curiosity. Fans already know a fresh Tomb Raider reveal is locked in. Geoff Keighley‚Äôs mysterious Mojave Desert statue has also stirred intense theory-crafting, with guesses ranging from Diablo 4 to an entirely new FromSoftware project. On the awards front, Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 leads the pack after a dominant sweep at The Golden Joysticks. With all eyes on the stage, audiences are ready to see what rises, what surprises the room, and what becomes the night‚Äôs defining moment.The show begins today at 7:30 p.m. ET and 4:30 p.m. PT across YouTube, Twitch, and TikTok. Audiences in the UK can tune in at 12:30 a.m. GMT, while Europe can join at 1:30 a.m. CEST.The opening thirty minutes serve as a pre-show that warms up the night before the major categories and reveals begin. The broadcast usually runs close to three hours, keeping viewers engaged with a steady flow of awards and new footage. Early winners include Doom The Dark Ages for Best Accessibility and Donkey Kong Bananza for Best Family Game, which hints at a competitive field across genres and styles.The show‚Äôs first reveal has already drawn attention. The Free Shepherd, an indie title slated for PS5 in 2027, introduces players to a haunting open world through the eyes of a loyal dog. The early footage suggests an emotional tone mixed with mystery. Major trailers lined up for the main program include Resident Evil Requiem, Lego Batman: Legacy of the Dark Knight, and the PS5 exclusive Saros. Viewers are also expecting the promised look at the ‚Äúfuture‚Äù of the Tomb Raider franchise. With a packed slate of premieres and a late-night demo drop for Pragmata, the stage is set for one of the most-watched shows in gaming.
Article Summary: The game awards 2025 kicks off today at 7:30 p.m. Et on youtube, twitch, and tiktok. Clair obscur: expedition 33 leads the pack after a dominant sweep at the golden joysticks. With a packed slate of premieres and a late-night demo drop, the stage is set for one of the most-watched shows in gaming.

Article Title: Fresh twist in Michael Jordan‚Äôs NASCAR battle as targeted team owner agrees to testify over ‚Äústupid redneck‚Äù slur
Article Text: A fierce legal battle between Michael Jordan and NASCAR over charter agreements has concluded with a settlement. The resolution grants permanent charters, a significant win for Jordan and team owners seeking stability in the racing world.

Article Title: 'I was very bored': Arshdeep Singh reveals when he decided to become a YouTuber
Article Text:
Virat Kohli and Arshdeep Singh

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Suryakumar Yadav Press Conference: on Sanju, Dube & India‚Äôs T20 Gameplan for South Africa

#arshdeepsingh #viratkohli #indiancricket

NEW DELHI: India pacer Arshdeep Singh has emerged as much a digital entertainer as a match-winning bowler ‚Äî and now he has revealed the surprising moment that pushed him into creating his wildly popular YouTube content. Speaking on JioHotstar, the left-arm quick said the idea struck him during one of the most frustrating phases of his career: when he was dropped from India's Playing XI for the opening match of the Champions Trophy 2025 in Dubai.India had opted for a spin-heavy combination throughout the tournament, leaving Arshdeep on the bench. But instead of sulking, he turned the setback into an opportunity. ‚ÄúWhen I got to know that I wouldn't be playing in the first game of the Champions Trophy, I was very bored in my room ‚Äî and that's when I started my YouTube channel. It turned out to be a blessing in disguise,‚Äù he said.Arshdeep explained that he tries to find positivity even in disappointment. ‚ÄúSometimes you just have to be grateful that you are playing at this level. You also have to wait for your chances, and when you get an opportunity, make sure you make the most of it,‚Äù he added.His fun, self-deprecating humour quickly resonated with fans, none more so than his recent viral reel with Virat Kohli, which has already crossed 1.3 million views. The banter came after Kohli missed a third straight ODI century in the series decider against South Africa in Visakhapatnam, where he finished unbeaten on 65 as India chased 271 with ease.Arshdeep, sensing content gold, joked to Kohli: ‚ÄúPaaji, run kam reh gaye‚Ä¶ century aaj pakki thi waise.‚ÄùKohli's response was instant and hilarious: ‚ÄúToss jeet gaye, nahi toh teri bhi pakki thi dew mein.‚ÄùWith India's bowlers having struggled under heavy dew in the earlier games in Ranchi and Raipur, Kohli's quip left the all in splits ‚Äî and gave Arshdeep yet another viral moment.
Article Summary: Arshdeep singh was dropped from india's playing xi for the opening match of the champions trophy 2025 in dubai. Instead of sulking, he turned the setback into an opportunity. The left-arm quick said the idea struck him during one of the most frustrating phases of his career.

Article Title: Lando Norris ranks third on Highest-Paid F1 Drivers list, says he wants to ‚Äúforget the season‚Äù
Article Text:
Lando Norris (Image credit: Instagram)

Max Verstappen tops Highest-Paid F1 Drivers List, Lando Norris ranks No.3

S.no. F1 Drivers Salary + bonus 1 Max Verstappen $76million 2 Lewis Hamilton $70.5million 3 Lando Norris $57.5million 4 Oscar Piastri $37.5million 5 Charles Leclerc $30million 6 Fernando Alonso $26.5million 7 George Russell $26million 8 Lance Stroll $13.5million 9 Carlos Sainz $13million 10 Kimi Antonelli $12.5million

Max Verstappen lost the Formula 1 World Championship to Lando Norris by just a whisker, two points, to be precise, but the Red Bull star still took home the biggest paycheck of the season. He earned around $76 million in the 2025 F1 season and justified the massive pay to the T. Forbes recently released the list of F1 drivers‚Äô salaries and bonuses, with new title winner Lando Norris ranking third. Here‚Äôs what the fastest drivers on Earth took home this year.Four-time world champion Max Verstappen dominated the 2025 F1 season not only with his performance but also with his earnings. He received a $65 million salary plus $11 million in bonuses. Seven-time world champion Lewis Hamilton took home a slightly lower salary of $70 million and just a $0.5 million bonus, as the Ferrari driver struggled throughout the season.New F1 champion Lando Norris ranked third on the list with a paycheck of $57.5 million. This included an $18 million salary along with a $39.5 million bonus. The McLaren star fully justified his huge bonus as he managed to snatch the championship from Verstappen and his own teammate Oscar Piastri.Speaking about his plans for the break, Norris said he was looking forward to the FIA Awards and then the McLaren Christmas party. On his plans outside F1, he told BBC Sport, ‚ÄúThen I go away with all my friends. We go skiing. I get all my injuries out of the way nice and early. And just enjoy some time with the people that you've probably seen on TV a lot over the last day - my parents, my brother and my sisters, and honestly, try to forget this season. Forget that I drive in Formula 1.‚ÄùOscar Piastri almost won the championship in the first half of the season before Norris overtook him in the Driver Standings. The 24-year-old Australian earned $37.5 million this year, comprising a $10 million salary and a $27.5 million bonus.Ferrari‚Äôs Charles Leclerc also delivered a solid performance this season and took home a $30 million paycheck.F1 will return next season with new regulations in place. This is expected to shake things up for some leading teams as the season kicks off with the Australian Grand Prix in March.Also Read: ‚ÄúIt took a championship‚Äù: Internet reacts as Lando Norris and Margarida Corceiro make their relationship Instagram official
Article Summary: Max verstappen tops highest-paid f1 drivers list, lando norris ranks no.3. Red bull star earned around $76 million in the 2025 f1 season. Lewis hamilton took home a slightly lower salary of $70 million and just a $0.5 million bonus.

Article Title: ‚ÄòEveryone has been so rude‚Äô: Taylor Swift breaks down Travis Kelce engagement etiquette on live TV, sparking new frenzy
Article Text:
Taylor Swift‚Äôs Colbert moment set the internet off. She joked ‚Äúeveryone has been so rude‚Äù after learning engagement etiquette and then revealed why her proposal from Travis Kelce still feels unreal. (Images via Getty)

Taylor Swift‚Äôs etiquette reaction on Colbert becomes the moment everyone is replaying

Taylor Swift explains why the Travis Kelce engagement still feels unreal despite public obsession

Taylor Swift‚Äôs engagement to Travis Kelce has been dissected for over a year, but the most unexpected moment finally arrived on ‚ÄúThe Late Show with Stephen Colbert.‚Äù Taylor Swift spoke openly about how unreal the Travis Kelce engagement still feels to her and then delivered the line that instantly took over social media: ‚ÄúEveryone has been so rude. ‚Äù What was meant to be a quick etiquette correction became the internet‚Äôs favorite clip.This appearance was part of Taylor Swift‚Äôs promo push for her Eras Tour docuseries. Instead, she ended up walking viewers into a rare look at why getting engaged to Travis Kelce still feels impossible to her, why she never assumed it would happen and why this year changed the trajectory of her life and career.Taylor Swift was listing three people she trusts most when Stephen Colbert stepped in to congratulate her on the Travis Kelce engagement. He then paused and corrected himself, reminding her of an etiquette rule she had never heard.He told Taylor Swift that tradition requires ‚Äúbest wishes‚Äù for the bride and ‚Äúcongratulations‚Äù for the groom. She stared at him and answered with the line that exploded online: ‚ÄúI never heard that until right now. Everyone has been so rude.‚ÄùStephen Colbert explained the reasoning. The man gets congratulations for securing the relationship.The woman gets best wishes because marriage was assumed. Taylor Swift processed the logic and said she loved learning something so oddly specific. She even told him she would come to him for wedding advice, and she meant it.Stephen Colbert highlighted her viral Instagram announcement next. He read her caption out loud, pointed to the framed photo on his desk and called the post a fan favorite. The moment also reminded viewers of how massive this year has been for her. Taylor Swift dropped a new album, ‚ÄúThe Life of a Showgirl,‚Äù released a docuseries and regained her masters. She agreed with Stephen Colbert when he said she had a ‚Äúgood year. ‚Äù She knew exactly what he meant.Once the laughter passed, Taylor Swift spoke about the part of the Travis Kelce engagement fans rarely hear. She said two major events this year always felt out of reach: getting her music rights back and getting engaged to Travis Kelce.‚ÄúLike getting engaged to the love of my life, getting all my music back. Those were two things that just never could have happened. They could‚Äôve just never happened. It wasn‚Äôt like, ‚ÄòOh, it‚Äôs just a matter of time.‚Äô‚ÄùTaylor Swift repeated the point because it matters to her. She never assumed either milestone was guaranteed. She said both could have missed her completely, and her gratitude was obvious.Earlier in the interview, she named Travis Kelce alongside Stevie Nicks and Max Martin when talking about the people she trusts for long-term advice. She told Stephen Colbert she can talk to Travis Kelce about everything from her career to her personal life. The audience reaction made it clear the relationship has reached a different level publicly.This adds context to the moment she described on ‚ÄúThe Tonight Show.‚Äù She told Jimmy Fallon how much effort Travis Kelce put into his proposal and how long he held onto the custom cushion-cut ring before giving it to her. She admitted she still catches herself staring at it.‚ÄúI look at it constantly. It does not feel in any way normal for me. I am just like, oh man, whoa.‚ÄùThen she explained why it means more than the ring itself.‚ÄúHe is just my favorite person I have ever met. The fact that this is the person that I get to hang out with every day forever is just like, that is the whole thing.‚ÄùTaylor Swift may have gone viral for a joke, but her interviews over the past few months tell a different story. She is stunned by the timing of the Travis Kelce engagement. She is still adjusting to the scale of her year. She is grateful because none of it felt guaranteed.Her line about everyone being rude might be the meme, but the truth beneath it is simple. Taylor Swift is living a year she once thought she would never experience, and the Travis Kelce engagement sits at the heart of it.
Article Summary: Taylor swift‚Äôs colbert moment set the internet off. She joked ‚Äúeveryone has been so rude‚Äù after learning engagement etiquette. Taylor swift spoke openly about how unreal the travis kelce engagement still feels to her and then delivered the line that instantly took over social media. She is still adjusting to the scale of her year.

Article Title: Strong SMAT show boosts pacer Ashok Sharma‚Äôs IPL auction stock
Article Text:
Ashok Sharma. (Image: X)

JAIPUR:

U-19 Asia Cup press conference: What Ayush Mhatre said before the tournament

A good performance in the Syed Mustaq Ali Trophy (SMAT), in which he is the leading wicket-taker, has boosted Rajasthan pacer Ashok Sharma‚Äôs IPL auction chances. The 23-year old leads the bowling charts with 19 wickets from seven league games at an economy rate of 8.84, including two four-wicket hauls. Dale Steyn admirer, Ashok was a net bowler for Royals in 2021, 2023 and 2024. Kolkata signed him for Rs 55 lakh in 2022 and ahead of IPL-2025, Royals brought him into the fold for Rs 30 lakh. He is yet to make his IPL debut.‚ÄúWhen I was with KKR in 2022, Pat Cummins told me to stay disciplined and keep backing the hard lengths because that‚Äôs my strength,‚Äù Ashok said.Three days ago, riding this rich vein of form, Ashok dashed off from Pune, where Rajasthan are playing the SMAT Super League games, to Mumbai to attend trials for Royal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB). With the IPL mini auction looming, the in form seamer looks certain to be a wanted man.During his stint with Rajasthan Royals later on, Shane Bond pushed him further. ‚ÄúBond said I must mix in bouncers, yorkers and slower balls so the batsman is never settled,‚Äù he added.The variations are showing results too. ‚ÄúMost wickets have still come from hard lengths, but I‚Äôve worked hard on the yorker especially, it‚Äôs fetched me a few key scalps,‚Äù said the Jaipur pacer who regularly clocks 140kph.Three days ago, riding this rich vein of form, Ashok dashed from Pune, where Rajasthan are playing SMAT Super League games, to Mumbai to attend trials for Royal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB). With the IPL mini auction looming, the in-form seamer looks certain to be a wanted man.From small beginnings, the journey has been swift for Ashok. His family wasn‚Äôt financially well off and Ashok, inspired by his elder brother, took to cricket. Their father, a farmer, was unable to fund coaching for both sons, so the elder brother sacrificed his dreams. At 17, Ashok joined an academy in Jaipur.Strong performances earned him a place in the U-23 Rest of India side, a trip to a high-performance camp at the Centre of Excellence and finally a Ranji Trophy debut this season.The maximum speed he has touched is 149kph against Punjab in an U-23 Rest of India game, according to his coach Jagsimran Singh. ‚ÄúThe main reason behind Ashok‚Äôs success is his speed and accuracy. We worked on him with help of biomechanics,‚Äù he said.
Article Summary: Rajasthan pacer ashok sharma is the leading wicket-taker in the syed mustaq ali trophy (smat) the 23-year-old leads the bowling charts with 19 wickets from seven league games at an economy rate of 8.84, including two four-wicket hauls. He is yet to make his ipl debut.

Article Title: IND vs SA STATS: South Africa create history, become the most successful team against India in T20Is
Article Text:
Jasprit Bumrah, left, and Tilak Varma, second left, congratulate South Africa's players. (PTI Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Most wins against India in T20Is

13 - South Africa (33 matches)

12 - Australia (37 mats)

12 - England (29 mats)

10 - New Zealand (25 mats)

10 - West Indies (30 mats)

Inside a champion‚Äôs mind | ft. Shafali, Deepti and Saiyami | TOI‚Äôs Ideas for India

Most wickets lost vs pacers by India in a T20I innings

10 vs SA, Mullanpur, 2025

9 vs WI, Basseterre, 2022

9 vs PAK, New York, 2024 WC

Biggest defeat for India in T20Is (by runs)



80 vs NZ, Wellington, 2019

51 vs SA, Mullanpur, 2025

49 vs AUS, Bridgetown, 2010

49 vs SA, Indore, 2022

47 vs NZ, Nagpur, 2016

NEW DELHI: India‚Äôs crushing 51-run loss to South Africa in Mullanpur on Thursday did not just level the five-match series 1-1 ‚Äî it also underlined an uncomfortable statistical reality. This was India‚Äôs 13th T20I defeat to South Africa in 33 matches, the most losses they have suffered against any opposition in the format. Australia and England follow with 12 each, but the Proteas now stand alone atop a list India would rather avoid.South Africa‚Äôs domination added another layer of statistical significance. Their pacers produced a rare, ruthless performance to dismiss India entirely with pace, marking the first time South African fast bowlers have taken all ten wickets in a T20I innings. India‚Äôs collapse ‚Äî all ten wickets falling to pace ‚Äî is also their worst such outing in T20Is, surpassing previous lows against the West Indies (nine wickets lost to pace in 2022) and Pakistan (nine in 2024).The numbers around India‚Äôs failed chase were equally damning. Set 214 after Quinton de Kock‚Äôs blazing 90 (46 balls), India folded for 162 in 19.1 overs. The defeat reaffirmed a long-standing hurdle: India have never successfully chased a 210-plus target in T20Is.Their record now reads: seven attempts, seven defeats.The 51-run margin also enters India‚Äôs list of biggest defeats by runs in T20Is ‚Äî second only to the 80-run hammering by New Zealand in Wellington (2019). It also joins heavy losses against Australia (49 runs, 2010), South Africa (49, 2022) and New Zealand (47, 2016).South Africa‚Äôs response to their 74-all-out embarrassment in Cuttack was emphatic. De Kock led the revival with seven sixes, while Donovan Ferreira‚Äôs 30 off 16 powered a 49-run burst in the final three overs. Ottneil Baartman, one of three changes, sealed the win with a superb 4 for 24.India‚Äôs chase never took flight. Shubman Gill fell in the first over, Abhishek Sharma sparkled briefly, and captain Suryakumar Yadav‚Äôs struggles continued. Tilak Varma‚Äôs 62 (34 balls) was the lone resistance, but even he could not prevent India from suffering their first T20I defeat in 14 matches with both Jasprit Bumrah and Arshdeep Singh in the XI.The series now moves to Dharamsala for the third T20I on Sunday, with India seeking answers ‚Äî and redemption ‚Äî before the T20 World Cup at home in February.
Article Summary: South africa beat india by 51 runs to level five-match series 1-1. India have never successfully chased a 210-plus target in t20is. India‚Äôs collapse ‚Äî all ten wickets falling to pace ‚Äî is also their worst such outing in t 20is.

Article Title: Fortnite Kim Kardashian Icon Cup: How to register, date, time, and prize details
Article Text:
Image via Fortnite

Everything you need to know about the Fortnite Kim Kardashian Icon Cup



How to register



Event date and time



Tournament format



Rewards



Basic Reward:

Top Prize - Iconic Kim Kardashian Skin (Regional Placements):

Top-placing players in each region will earn the full "Iconic Kim Kardashian" Skin. The required placement rank for each region varies and will be available in the in-game Compete tab.

Top Prize Tier 2:

The globally recognized media personality Kim Kardashian is all set to join the Fortnite Icon Series, and it is one of the biggest introductions of recent times. To celebrate her arrival, the developers are organizing a special time-limited competitive tournament, the Kim Kardashian Icon Cup. It offers you a wonderful opportunity to unlock her outfit completely free.The Icon Cup takes place on December 12, 2025, as a Solos Battle Royale competition, with you being allowed to play a maximum of ten matches. In addition to the outfit, an exclusive spray is also up for grabs. The following section provides all the details about the Fortnite Kim Kardashian Icon Cup.Registering for the Kim Kardashian Icon Cup is quite simple, and you can directly access it through Fortnite's in-game Compete tab. However, there are some requirements that you must match. Basically, you must have Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA) enabled on your account and be at Account Level 50 or above to participate. If you meet these requirements, you may navigate to the Compete section and select the Kim Kardashian Icon Cup to register.The Kim Kardashian Icon Cup is going to take place on December 12, 2025. You can check the in-game Compete tab for your region's specific start time, as the timing will vary by server region.Coming to the tournament format, the Kim Kardashian Icon Cup in Fortnite is going to be a Solos Battle Royale tournament. This means that you will compete alone in up to ten matches during the three-hour session. Your points in the competition will be based upon several factors, like Victory Royales, eliminations, and placement.You can get the following rewards as part of the upcoming Fortnite Kim Kardashian Icon Cup:Everyone who earns 8 points or more will unlock the exclusive "Heart Breakers" Spray.This includes the ‚ÄúRing Light To Go‚Äù Back Bling (part of the Kim Kardashian bundle) for top-performing players.Even if you fail to obtain the bundle for free, it will be made available in the Fortnite Item Shop shortly after the event, allowing you to purchase it directly.
Article Summary: The kim kardashian icon cup is going to take place on december 12, 2025. It is a solos battle royale competition, with you being allowed to play a maximum of ten matches. Top-placing players in each region will earn the full "iconic kim kardashian" skin.

Article Title: T20 World Cup: Lowest-ever ticket pricing for any India-Pakistan ICC tie
Article Text:
2026 ICC Men's T20 World Cup. (Image: File)

MUMBAI:

Rovman Powell Unfiltered: 'Playing in the IPL changed my life'

In good news for fans, the ticket prices of the much-awaited 2026 Men‚Äôs T20 World Cup clash between India and Pakistan on Feb 15 at the R Premadasa Stadium in Colombo will start as low as Rs 438 (Rs 1500 Sri Lankan rupees).This is perhaps the lowest-ever ticket price for an India versus Pakistan World Cup game.On Thursday, the International Cricket Council (ICC) announced the opening of ticket sales for ‚ÄòPhase 1‚Äô of the upcoming T20 World Cup (ticket sales opened at 6.45pm on Thursday), pricing entry-level tickets at just Rs 100 at some venues in India and LKR1000 in Sri Lanka, the lowest ever for an ICC event.In a media release, the ICC said that it has ‚Äúreduced one of the primary entry barriers for fans by making the tickets highly affordable in Phase I.With pricing starting from Rs 100 in India and LKR1000 in Sri Lanka and more than two million tickets going on sale, the ICC aspires to democratize in-stadia experience of ICC events.‚ÄùThe 10th edition of the tournament will be staged across eight venues from Feb 7-March 8 across India and Sri Lanka.
Article Summary: 2026 icc men's t20 world cup. 10th edition of the tournament will be staged across eight venues from feb 7-march 8 across india and sri lanka. Entry-level tickets at some venues in india and lkr1000 in sri lanka, the lowest ever for an icc event.

Article Title: Everything to know about MrBeast‚Äôs Beast Games season 2: Premiere date, prize money, and participant lineup
Article Text:
Image Via Instagram

Beast Games

Key details about Beast Games season 2

Important highlights:

200 total participants, representing a wide mix of physical, strategic, and mental skill sets







$5 million up for grabs, the biggest single prize in the show‚Äôs history







First three episodes premiere January 7, followed by weekly releases







Finale airs February 25 on Prime Video







Core format blends mental strategy with physical endurance, creating a mind-versus-muscle competition environment







Crossover episode with Survivor, featuring host Jeff Probst







Filmed partly in Saudi Arabia, showcasing upgraded arenas including full basketball courts







Co-created by MrBeast, Sean Klitzner, Tyler Conklin, and Mack Hopkins







Season 2 expands the structure with tougher logic-based challenges, high-stakes physical tasks, and more complex team dynamics



‚ÄúStrong vs. Smart‚Äù





The massive reality competition series created by Jimmy Donaldson, better known as MrBeast, is gearing up for an even bigger return asseason 2 hits Prime Video. Following the explosive success of its debut run, which became Prime Video‚Äôs most-watched unscripted show with more than 50 million viewers, the series is raising the stakes across every category: prize pool, competition scale, arena size, and global ambition. With season 2 arriving in early 2026, fans can expect a more intense format, higher production values, and landmark crossovers.Season 2 officially premieres January 7, 2026, with the first three episodes dropping on the same day. Weekly episodes will continue until the grand finale on February 25. This chapter features an expanded 200-participant lineup, consisting of individuals from diverse backgrounds brought in to test the boundaries of endurance, strategy, and survival-style gameplay. With a staggering $5 million grand prize, Beast Games season 2 aims to deliver not just spectacle, but a never-before-seen mix of physical and mental challenges.This season of Beast Games evolves the franchise with larger arenas, new challenge themes, and ambitious global production elements.Contestants will face a blend of obstacle-based physical rounds, high-pressure decision-making tasks, alliance-driven gameplay, and mentally demanding challenges. With thetheme not heavily emphasized publicly, Season 2 leans into unpredictability and escalating difficulty to keep both players and viewers on edge.Beast Games season 2 promises to be one of the biggest reality competitions ever produced, pairing MrBeast‚Äôs signature high-stakes approach with Prime Video‚Äôs streaming reach. With a massive prize pool, an expanded roster, and the addition of major crossovers, the new season is poised to surpass its predecessor in scale and spectacle. As January 7 approaches, anticipation continues to build for another groundbreaking season.Also Read: FanFan Diddy joke fallout grows as TheStockGuy reports receiving death threats for speaking out
Article Summary: Beast games season 2 officially premieres january 7, 2026, with the first three episodes dropping on the same day. Weekly episodes will continue until the grand finale on february 25. This chapter features an expanded 200-participant lineup, consisting of individuals from diverse backgrounds brought in to test the boundaries of endurance, strategy, and survival-style gameplay.
